member.name: T:Waher.Script.Persistence.SQL.Select
member.summary: Executes a SELECT statement against the object database.
Executes a SELECT statement against the object database.
member.param: Columns to select. If null, all columns are selected.
Optional limit on number of records to return
Optional offset into result set where reporting begins
If only distinct (unique) rows are to be returned.
Length of expression covered by node.

member.summary: Calls the callback method for all child nodes.
